path: artifacts/DexterLabs Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

project_path.DexterLabs: contracts/DexterLabs Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/DexterLabs

findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: The contract is heavily centralized, and any compromise of the owner could lead to bricking the contract or a loss of funds.

findings.title: Privileged account transfers
findings.description: If renouncing privileges is not done appropriately, the current beneficiary can renounce their privileges and still be excluded from fees while the new beneficiary will be able to collect fees and still retain same privileges.
findings.location: setFeesAddress(), setBuybackAddress(), setMarketingAddress(), setDevelopmentAddress and setLPtokenReciver() functions

findings.title: Input sanitization
findings.description: Majority of functions could behave irregularly because of the lack of input validation.

findings.title: Missing test cases
findings.description: The codebase lacks unit test coverage.

findings.title: Event emission
findings.description: Some contract functions that update the vaultâ€™s state do not emit events when called.
